R

readInput() - Method in class GenotypeGraph.GenotypeGraph
reads an input file in "BML" format from STDIN: #samples #genes '\n' spaced list of all HUGO symbols for each gene '\n' sampleID and relative boolean array of mutation presence '\n' (repeated #samples times)
recADD(TRaITNode, TRaITMarkovNode, MarkovChain, ArrayList<String>) - Method in class MutationGraph.TRaITGraph
recursion for the Markov chain creation, it operates following all the possible paths within the input graph.
reduceGenes(boolean[], ArrayList<boolean[]>) - Method in class GenotypeGraph.GenotypeGraph
Applies the threshold set by the user to reduce the dataset
root - Variable in class DatasetGenerators.GraphDatasetGenerator
reference to the node containing the clonal genotype
root - Variable in class GenotypeGraph.WeightedGenotypeGraph
